## What's your question?




---
You can use code blocks to describe your code if you want to.

For example:

```processing
void setup() {
  size(1280, 720);
  background(0);
}

void draw() {
  background(0);
  stroke(255);
  line(0, 0, width, height);
}

void mousePressed() {
  exit();
}
```
